name: io.github.hyperbrowserai/mcp
description: Hyperbrowser's Model Context Protocol (MCP) Server providing tools to scrape, extract structured data, and crawl webpages, with access to general purpose browser agents.

environment_variables.name: HYPERBROWSER_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: API key for Hyperbrowser MCP Server

tools.name: scrape_webpage
tools.description: Extract formatted (markdown, screenshot etc) content from any webpage

tools.name: crawl_webpages
tools.description: Navigate through multiple linked pages and extract LLM-friendly formatted content

tools.name: extract_structured_data
tools.description: Convert messy HTML into structured JSON

tools.name: search_with_bing
tools.description: Query the web and get results with Bing search

tools.name: browser_use_agent
tools.description: Fast, lightweight browser automation with the Browser Use agent

tools.name: openai_computer_use_agent

tools.name: claude_computer_use_agent

tools.name: create_profile

tools.name: delete_profile
tools.description: Deletes an existing persistent Hyperbrowser profile.
